Source_Event_IDs.description: All original event IDs from various sources (e.g., GLIDE_number). If only one source provides an ID, this array will have a single string.

Event_Name.description: An array of event names from different sources. If sources differ, all unique names are retained.

Event_Type.description: An array of event types from different sources (e.g., 'Flood', 'FL'). If sources differ, all unique variations are retained.

Country.description: An array of country names from different sources. If multiple sources differ, all unique names are retained.

Country_Code.description: An array of ISO3 country codes. If multiple sources differ, all unique codes are retained.

Location.description: List of sub-national locations or administrative areas. If multiple sources differ, all are included.

Latitude.description: Array of latitude values. If multiple coordinates differ, all are included.

Longitude.description: Array of longitude values. If multiple coordinates differ, all are included.

Date.description: ISO 8601 formatted date-time representing the event date. If sources differ, you may store one or eventually keep multiple values.

Year.description: Year extracted from the Date. If multiple years differ, you may store one chosen year or expand to an array if needed.

Month.description: Month extracted from the Date. Similar considerations as Year.

Day.description: Day extracted from the Date. Similar considerations as Year.

Time.description: Time extracted from the Date. If multiple times differ among sources, could be converted to an array if needed.

Severity.description: Severity indicators (e.g., magnitude) from different sources, stored as an array of strings.

Source.description: List of sources that contributed to this record.

Comments.description: Array of comments or notes from various sources.
